title: Authors and Citation
text: Flavio Leccese. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Leccese F (2024). euroleaguer: 'Euroleague basketball API' R Client. R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/FlavioLeccese92/euroleaguer/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {euroleaguer: 'Euroleague basketball API' R Client},   author = {Flavio Leccese},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://github.com/FlavioLeccese92/euroleaguer/}, }

title: Euroleague basketball API R Client
text: euroleaguer provides easy way retrieve data EuroLeague EuroCup API R.  un-official API wrapper recommend follow usual rules conduct dealing open API calls.

title: Euroleague basketball API R Client
text: get current development version GitHub:
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("FlavioLeccese92/euroleaguer")

title: Euroleague basketball API R Client
text: Despite Euroleague official APIs well designed immediate, intense analytical use demands adjustments terms get-requests output. euroleaguer possible input multiple arguments (handling loops internally), values returned tibbles columns consistent throughout functions, avoiding ambiguity stats naming 2FG% (2 field-goal %) 2P% (2 points %). short, saving time collection cleaning leaving pure analysis.

title: Euroleague basketball API R Client
text: — construction — Get team logos Get player images — construction —
code:
getCompetitionTeams("E2023") %>% mutate(ImageTag = glue("")) %>% pull(ImageTag) %>% paste0(., collapse = " ") %>% paste0("
", ., "
") %>% HTML(.) getPlayerStats("E2023") %>% mutate(ImageUrl = glue("")) %>% slice_max(PIR, n = 20) %>% pull(ImageUrl) %>% paste0(., collapse = " ") %>% paste0("
", ., "
") %>% HTML(.)

title: Api internal functions — .inheritParams
text: Primitive Api wrapper functions exported since allow one call time. Instead, equivalent functions exposed allowing multiple parameters, making easier retrieve data users.

title: Api internal functions — .inheritParams
text: competition_code One competition codes. Admitted values E Euroleague U Eurocup. team_code One team codes obtained getCompetitionTeams(). Examples ASV, MAD, ... game_code One game codes obtained getCompetitionGames(). season_code One season codes obtained getCompetitionHistory(). Examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023. round One round codes obtained getCompetitionRounds(). phase_type One phase type codes obtained getCompetitionPhases(). Admitted values RS regular season, PO playoffs FF final four. Default . subset One game subsets. Admitted values HomeGames, AwayGames, GamesWon, GamesLost, ResultsIn5Points (games resulted +/-5 points) . Default . statistic_mode One aggregation modes statistics. Admitted values perGame, perMinute accumulated.

text: season_code One season codes obtained getCompetitionHistory(). Examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023. round One round codes obtained getCompetitionRounds().

title: Get competition ahead-behind standings — getCompetitionAheadBehind
text: Returns summary tibble ahead-behind chosen competition round Reference webpage: Ahead-behind standings

title: Competition metadata — getCompetitionHistory
text: Retrieve values arguments specific data collection functions across package.

title: Competition metadata — getCompetitionHistory
code: getCompetitionHistory(competition_code)  getCompetitionRounds(season_code)  getCompetitionPhases(season_code)  getCompetitionTeams(season_code)  getCompetitionGames(season_code, round, phase_type = "All")

title: Competition metadata — getCompetitionHistory
text: competition_code One competition codes. Admitted values E Euroleague U Eurocup. season_code One season codes obtained getCompetitionHistory(). Examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023. round One round codes obtained getCompetitionRounds(). phase_type One phase type codes obtained getCompetitionPhases(). Admitted values RS regular season, PO playoffs FF final four. Default .

title: Competition metadata — getCompetitionHistory

title: Get game box-score — getGameBoxScore

title: Get game box-score — getGameBoxScore
text: game_code One game codes obtained getCompetitionGames(). season_code One season codes obtained getCompetitionHistory(). Examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023.

title: Get game box-score — getGameBoxScore
text: Returns list elements chosen games seasons Team. Name teams Coach. Name coaches EndOfQuarter. Team accumulated points quarter ByQuarter. Team points quarter PlayerStats. Statistics player game TeamStats. Aggregated statistics team game Glossary columns: Reference webpage: BoxScore

title: Get game evolution — getGameEvolution

title: Get game evolution — getGameEvolution
text: game_code One game codes obtained getCompetitionGames(). season_code One season codes obtained getCompetitionHistory(). Examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023.

title: Get game evolution — getGameEvolution
text: Returns list two elements chosen games seasons EvolutionSummary. Overall information minimum maximum difference scores teams Evolution. Minute minute points team Reference webpage: GraphicStats

title: Get game evolution — getGameEvolution
code: getGameEvolution(season_code = c("E2023", "U2023"), game_code = 1) #> $EvolutionSummary #> # A tibble: 2 × 6 #>   GameCode SeasonCode MinuteMaxA MinuteMaxB ScoreMaxA ScoreMaxB #>      <dbl> <chr>      <chr>      <chr>      <chr>     <chr>     #> 1        1 E2023      23         0          62 - 37   0 - 0     #> 2        1 U2023      11         0          38 - 15   0 - 0     #>  #> $Evolution #> # A tibble: 82 × 7 #>    GameCode SeasonCode Minute PointsTeamA PointsTeamB DiffTeamA DiffTeamB #>       <dbl> <chr>       <int>       <int>       <int>     <int>     <int> #>  1        1 E2023           0           3           2         1        NA #>  2        1 E2023           1           6           4         2        NA #>  3        1 E2023           2          12           6         6        NA #>  4        1 E2023           3          17           7        10        NA #>  5        1 E2023           4          19          10         9        NA #>  6        1 E2023           5          22          14         8        NA #>  7        1 E2023           6          24          14        10        NA #>  8        1 E2023           7          26          16        10        NA #>  9        1 E2023           8          29          16        13        NA #> 10        1 E2023           9          29          18        11        NA #> # ℹ 72 more rows #>

title: Get game play-by-play — getGamePlayByPlay

title: Get game play-by-play — getGamePlayByPlay
text: game_code One game codes obtained getCompetitionGames(). season_code One season codes obtained getCompetitionHistory(). Examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023.

title: Get game play-by-play — getGamePlayByPlay
text: Returns list two elements chosen games seasons PlayByPlaySummary. Overall information games, teams involved status (live ) PlayByPlay. Detailed information games, particularly NumberOfPlay PlayType Glossary PlayType: Reference webpage: PlayByPlay

title: Get team lead statistics — getTeamLeadStats
code: getTeamLeadStats(season_code, phase_type = "All", subset = "All")

title: Get team lead statistics — getTeamLeadStats
text: season_code One season codes obtained getCompetitionHistory(). Examples E2023 Euroleague U2023 Eurocup 2023. phase_type One phase type codes obtained getCompetitionPhases(). Admitted values RS regular season, PO playoffs FF final four. Default . subset One game subsets. Admitted values HomeGames, AwayGames, GamesWon, GamesLost, ResultsIn5Points (games resulted +/-5 points) . Default .

title: Get team lead statistics — getTeamLeadStats
text: Returns list elements chosen seasons, phase_type subset. TeamAccumulated. Total sum statistics teams team TeamAveragePerGame. Average per game statistics teams Glossary columns: Reference webpage: TeamLead

title: Get team lead statistics — getTeamLeadStats
code: TeamLeadStats = getTeamLeadStats(season_code = c("E2022", "E2023"), phase_type = "RS")  TeamLeadStats$TeamAccumulated |> head(5) #> # A tibble: 5 × 30 #>   SeasonCode PhaseType Subset TeamCode    GP TimePlayedSeconds   PIR   PTS   FTM #>   <chr>      <chr>     <chr>  <chr>    <int>             <int> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> #> 1 E2022      RS        All    MAD         41             99300  4129  3500   685 #> 2 E2022      RS        All    OLY         41             98400  4119  3393   574 #> 3 E2022      RS        All    MCO         41             99300  3729  3374   715 #> 4 E2022      RS        All    PAR         39             94200  3652  3332   701 #> 5 E2022      RS        All    BAR         39             94200  3583  3140   535 #> # ℹ 21 more variables: FTA <dbl>, `FT%` <dbl>, `2PM` <dbl>, `2PA` <dbl>, #> #   `2P%` <dbl>, `3PM` <dbl>, `3PA` <dbl>, `3P%` <dbl>, FGM <dbl>, FGA <dbl>, #> #   `FG%` <dbl>, REB <dbl>, OREB <dbl>, DREB <dbl>, AST <dbl>, STL <dbl>, #> #   BLK <dbl>, BLKA <dbl>, TO <dbl>, FD <dbl>, FC <dbl>  TeamLeadStats$TeamAveragePerGame |> head(5) #> # A tibble: 5 × 30 #>   SeasonCode PhaseType Subset TeamCode    GP TimePlayedSeconds   PIR   PTS   FTM #>   <chr>      <chr>     <chr>  <chr>    <int>             <int> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> #> 1 E2022      RS        All    MAD         41             99300 101.   85.4  16.7 #> 2 E2022      RS        All    OLY         41             98400 100.   82.8  14   #> 3 E2022      RS        All    MCO         41             99300  91.0  82.3  17.4 #> 4 E2022      RS        All    PAR         39             94200  93.6  85.4  18.0 #> 5 E2022      RS        All    BAR         39             94200  91.9  80.5  13.7 #> # ℹ 21 more variables: FTA <dbl>, `FT%` <dbl>, `2PM` <dbl>, `2PA` <dbl>, #> #   `2P%` <dbl>, `3PM` <dbl>, `3PA` <dbl>, `3P%` <dbl>, FGM <dbl>, FGA <dbl>, #> #   `FG%` <dbl>, REB <dbl>, OREB <dbl>, DREB <dbl>, AST <dbl>, STL <dbl>, #> #   BLK <dbl>, BLKA <dbl>, TO <dbl>, FD <dbl>, FC <dbl>
